Source

 CxList methods = Find_Methods();

CxList dynamic_method_invoke =
	methods.FindByShortName("eval") +
	methods.FindByShortName("qq");

CxList inputs = Find_DB_Out() + Find_Read();

result = inputs.DataInfluencingOn(dynamic_method_invoke);
